page.title: 10Recreation
page.content: Recreation. Cricket. Riding. Walking Findon Cricket Club was founded in l867 but cricket was played in and around Findon for more than l00 years before that. The ground is named Kennel Bottom, from the kennels where the foxhounds were lodged at the north-east corner. There are about 60 playing members and 200 social members. Ages range from 9 to 76 years. There is a charity match every other year for Lavinia, Duchess of Norfolk's charity. In l985 the All England Women's team played Findon and the result was a draw. A network of bridle and footpaths over the Downs is popular with residents and visitors alike. On Blackpatch Hill radio-controlled powered model aircraft are flown.
